title: Wine Down Wednesdays
short_description: Uncork 1/2 priced bottles of wine every Wednesday at The Padre Hotel! We're offering 50% off bottles $80-$200 or buy any $200 bottle and get the second 1/2 off at all our venues
description: Uncork 1/2 priced bottles of wine every Wednesday at The Padre Hotel! We're offering 50% off bottles $80-$200 or buy any $200 bottle and get the second 1/2 off at all our venues - Belvedere Room, Brimstone, Prairie Fire or Propsect!
